product_name: The North Face Base Camp Hot Shot Daypack - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Whether caught in the rain on campus or snow on the slopes, The North Face Base Camp Hot Shot daypack protects your gear with the same durable, waterproof fabric as the legendary Base Camp duffel. Flexible, ventilated shoulder straps are injection-molded and contoured for load-carrying comfort. Padded back panel with a breathable spine channel helps keep you comfortable during intense activity and warm weather. Large main compartment can accommodate most 15-in. laptops; universal sleeve with hydration port holds a hydration reservoir (not included). Organization compartment makes small items easy to find; mesh pockets on each side keep water bottles or snacks within easy reach. The North Face Base Camp Hot Shot pack features side compression straps and water-resistant zippers. Closeout.
short_description: Whether caught in the rain on campus or snow on the slopes, The North Face Base Camp Hot Shot daypack protects your gear with the same durable, waterproof fabric as the legendary Base Camp duffel.
